personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: Update your personal information and contact details

kennel.title: Kennel Information
kennel.description: Set your kennel name and other business details

account.title: Account
account.description: Manage your account settings and user preferences

sharing.title: Account Sharing
sharing.description: Share access to your breeding records with other users

roleDescriptions.viewer: Can view breeding records and dog information but cannot make changes
roleDescriptions.editor: Can edit breeding records and manage dogs but cannot change account settings

emptyState.title: No shared users
emptyState.description: You haven't shared access with anyone yet

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
deleteAccount.confirmDescription: This will permanently delete your account and all your data. This action cannot be undone.

help.description: Get help with using the application

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Learn the basics of using the breeding management system

managingDogs.title: Managing Dogs
managingDogs.description: How to add, edit, and organize your dog profiles

trackingPregnancies.title: Tracking Pregnancies
trackingPregnancies.description: Monitor pregnancies and record important milestones

planningLitters.title: Planning Litters
planningLitters.description: Plan future breeding combinations and track heat cycles

recordKeeping.title: Record Keeping
recordKeeping.description: Best practices for maintaining accurate breeding records

support.title: Support & Contact
support.contactDescription: If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact our support team.
